response.overview: Yi Kai grows up in a happy family like everyone else. It is not different to him. Until a parent day, he becomes the one that the classmates laugh at and bully. He gradually realizes that the fact of having two fathers is different from others. But ridiculous bullying does not disappear with his tolerance. You Xiang leads everyone to bully him again and again until Yi Kai shuts himself. One day, the teacher announces the topic of a reciting contest: "My Family". Yi Kai refuses to participate in the contest. After the teacher patiently encourages him, he decides to speak out to everyone through the contest. But this upsets You Xiang. An accident happens and causes the pain that You Xiang and Yi Kai could not erase…
response.title: Happiness
